title: Miniature Cherry Scene with Vintage Kitchen Scale – 1:12 Scale Dollhouse Decor
description: A bright and detailed miniature cherry scene in 1:12 scale — entirely handcrafted. Each element, from the vintage-style kitchen scale to the ripe cherries, was sculpted and painted by me with great care. All the cherries are securely attached to the scale's bowl. This tiny composition captures the charm of a nostalgic kitchen: an old-fashioned scale filled to the brim with lifelike cherries, with a few delicately hanging over the edge. A perfect decoration for a dollhouse or…
